author: Victor Bergeron A.K.A Trader Vic
description: A wonderfully fruity, fluffy and kitsch Tiki drink.
name: Kava
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
